categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Cryle was a male Human Jedi Initiate enrolled in the Coruscant Jedi Temple's academy during the final decade of the Galactic Republic.

A Human male, Cryle was identified as Force-sensitive and given over to the Jedi Order for training in the ways of the Force. Assigned to an Initiate Clan, Cryle was the oldest of his clan mates and was a callous and brash boy, with a disregard for the Jedi Code.

While the Clone Wars raged between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, Cryle and his fellow students Ammon and Tryla accompanied Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker on a training mission to a jungle planet. There, Cryle constantly harassed Ammon before being admonished for this by Skywalker.
